tent_title: Pitches for Tents, Caravans and Motorhomes
tent_text_1: Enjoy a stay close to nature with our spacious and shaded pitches, with or without electricity, suitable for tents, caravans, and motorhomes. Each plot is clearly marked and located near the sanitary facilities for your comfort.
tent_text_2: Book now with ease and let us welcome you in the best possible conditions!
mobile_text_1: Comfort and peace await you in our fully equipped mobile homes, perfect for a stay with family or friends. Each unit includes an outdoor space to enjoy the green surroundings of the campsite.
mobile_text_2: Reservations are only made by phone to ensure the best availability.
